properties.publicRemarks: A rare property for an owner occupant or an Investment Jewel in the Desert being offered Turnkey Furnished, Short-Term Rental on 5 Acres! A great home that delivers stunning design and provides long-term growth. Welcome to 724 Bluegrass Ave, a fully renovated property already turning heads on Airbnb and VRBO with rave guest reviews and consistent bookings. Set on a sprawling five-acre lot in the heart of Twentynine Palms. The current owners have poured heart, vision, and capital into extensive renovations, sparing you the expense and effort. Everything is already done. All that's left is for you to step in and start living or earning. Inside, you'll find a home that masterfully blends charm and character with modern upgradesâ€”inviting, stylish, and 100% move-in ready or ready to rent. It's a space that guests fall in love with, and one you can easily personalize or expand upon to build even more equity and allure. Perfectly located and close to Joshua Tree National Park, this property strikes the perfect balance between seclusion and accessibility. Whether you're offering a peaceful desert escape or looking to enjoy it as your own private retreat, the potential here is enormous. Beautiful desert and mountain views. Twentynine Palms is in the midst of an economic surge, making this an ideal moment to stake your claim in a growing market with plenty of upside. 724 Bluegrass Aveis not just a smart buy; it's a phenomenal opportunity for the savvy investor, creative host, or visionary homeowner. Call today to schedule a private tour and see what makes this property an absolute standout in the desert.
